meanings.definition: A type of fine porcelain or china.
meanings.sent1: My grandmother collects beautiful saxe plates.
meanings.sent2: The antique shop had a display of delicate saxe teacups.
meanings.sent3: During the tea party, the saxe plate started singing!
meanings.sent4: Her collection of saxe porcelain was as fragile as a butterfly's wing.
meanings.sent5: The saxe china gleamed under the soft light, enchanting everyone.

meanings.sent1: Mr. Saxe is a famous historian.
meanings.sent2: The Saxe family reunion is always a joyous occasion.
meanings.sent3: When Saxe walked into the room, everyone cheered!
meanings.sent4: The Saxe name carried a legacy of honor and integrity.
meanings.sent5: The Saxe surname echoed through the halls of history.

meanings.definition: A type of dance music originating in Chicago.
meanings.sent1: The DJ played a mix of hip-hop and saxe beats.
meanings.sent2: The club was filled with the energetic sounds of saxe music.
meanings.sent3: The saxe rhythm got everyone on the dance floor moving.
meanings.sent4: Her heart danced to the saxe melody, feeling alive.
meanings.sent5: The saxe music pulsed through the crowd, creating a vibrant atmosphere.
